thread.title: Actor throws his weight around
thread.title_full: Actor throws his weight around - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Actor throws his weight around
text: Meow in Bengaluru: This actor from a filmi family recently hosted his birthday party at a hotspot. He booked an entire level for his guests, and made sure extra valets, staff and bouncers were provided just for the evening. We hear that he even asked the management to instruct its staff not to use their smartphones through the evening, in the hope that no untoward picture is leaked. Considering there are quite a few candid couples in the industry, one of which also includes him, this paranoia is understandable. But again, not much can slip past our catty eyes, can it?
